{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T16:12:00.000Z", "description": "

Requirements

  • Master's Degree in Applied Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Statistics or related technical field
  • 8-10 years
  • Healthcare experience preferred.


Skills, Abilities, Experience

  • Advanced knowledge in data science tools (Python, R, Linux, etc.)
  • Advanced SQL skills (MS SQL Server, Snowflake, etc.)
  • Advanced Microsoft Excel knowledge
  • Proficiency in data visualization tools (Domo, Tableau, Power BI, etc.)
  • Effective communication skills
  • Forward-thinking, curious, creative
  • Able to lead people or projects
  • Aware of current marketplace trends
  • Able to collect and analyze complex information, problem solve and make decisions
  • Strong skills in inspiring the win-win-win
  • Able to work independently
